refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the initial values for a set of MIDI controllers.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sets the initial values for a set of MIDI controllers.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ctrlinit ichnl, ictlno1, ival1 [, ictlno2] [, ival2] [, ictlno3] \ [, ival3] [,...ival32]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ictlno1, ictlno1, etc. -- MIDI controller numbers (0-127)
ival1, ival2, etc. -- initial value for corresponding MIDI controller number

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Sets the initial values for a set of MIDI controllers.
